mapper.select: select A.topic_type, A.topic_title, A.topic_short_cont, B.topic_long_cont, B.topic_pro, B.topic_con, C.debate_endate, C.debate_tot_pro, C.debate_tot_con, C.debate_tot_neut, (Select user_nick From user_tbl where user_no = A.user_no) AS user_nick FROM topic_tbl AS A INNER JOIN topic_detail_tbl AS B INNER JOIN debate_tbl AS C where A.topic_no = B.topic_no = C.topic_no = 1;
select topic_resource_title, topic_resource_link from topic_resource_tbl where topic_no = 1
select A.op_no,A.op_content,A.op_like,A.op_rel, A.op_regdate, A.vote_type,(Select user_nick From user_tbl where user_no = A.user_no) AS user_nick from opinion_tbl AS A where topic_no = 1;
